description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Corey Haines - CTO of Hearken

ABSTRACT
Agility, and especially the methodologies linked to this idea, often include the phrase "Inspect and Adapt." That is, we start with a process, then, based on regular retrospectives, we should adapt to our context. But, what then? [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7771

https://twitter.com/gotocph
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference

title: Inspect & Adapt, then What?
